resources.string:
Coming soon. Pages dispatched through CodeMessaging can be delivered without incurring text messaging fees. And received on Android tablets. Stay tuned for further details
 
 What"'"s new in this release
 
 The way we calculate demo limits has changed (again). Now you have the usual 30 day trial demo, but now Cadpage doesn"'"t count days where you only use the generic locations. Enforcement logic for the demo expiration isn"'"t in this release, but expect it in the next one.
 
 There is now a separate app that is a free version of Cadpage that does everything the standard one does, except that there are only minimal support options, and updates will published a lot less frequently.
 
 New Locations:
 New Haven County, CT (alternate)
 Collier County, FL
 Cook County, IL
 Calhoun County, MI
 Salem County, NJ (alternate)
 Butler County, PA
 York County, PA
 Niagara County, NY
 Galveston, TX
 Brunswick County, VA
 
 Location Parsing Fixes:
 Sonoma County, CA
 New Haven County, CT
 was North Brandon
 Winnebago County, IL
 was Roscoe
 Anne Arundel County, MD
 Livingston County, MI
 Ray County, MO
 Cabarrus County, NC
 Davidson County, NC
 Guilford County, NC
 Orange County, NC
 Rowan County, NC
